text: Aldo Ciccolini (, 15 August 1925 – 1 February 2015), was an Italian-French pianist. He was born in Naples, Italy. He taught at the Conservatoire de Paris from 1970 to 1988. His students included Akiko Ebi, Géry Moutier, Jean-Yves Thibaudet, Artur Pizarro, Nicholas Angelich, André Sayasov and Jean-Luc Kandyoti.Piano ma non solo, Jean-Pierre Thiollet, Anagramme Ed., 2012, p. 79. Ciccolini died at the age of 89 on 1 February 2015 at his home in Paris. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Entertainers from Campania Category:French pianists Category:Italian educators Category:Italian musicians Category:Musicians from Naples
title: Aldo Ciccolini
